attributes.action: Allow call to prayer from the mosques
attributes.additional_details: Other countries allow the call to prayer aloud why not our country I am a female British Muslim and I believe this would be an extremely good thing to do even if it’s just the day time prayers therefore it is not noise pollution or disturbing people at night .
attributes.background: We would like the adhan  call to prayer loud from mosques . Even just the day time prayers .

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for local councils

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
